00025 enum class algorithm
00026 {
00027         bmz  = CMPH_BMZ,
00028         bmz8 = CMPH_BMZ8,
00029         chm  = CMPH_CHM,
00030         brz  = CMPH_BRZ,
00031         fch  = CMPH_FCH,
00032         bdz  = CMPH_BDZ,
00033         chd  = CMPH_CHD
00034 };
00035 
00036 template <typename T>
00037 class builder {
00038 
00039 public:
00040 
00041         typedef typename cmph_map<T>::key_type      key_type;
00042         typedef typename cmph_map<T>::value_type    value_type;
00043         typedef typename cmph_map<T>::checksum_type checksum_type;
00044 
00045 private:
00046 
00047         typedef value::pair<checksum_type, value_type> entry_type;
00048         typedef value::value_traits<entry_type>        entry_traits;
00049 
00050 public:
00051 
00052         static const char key_value_delim = '\t';
00053 
00054         static const std::string index_file_name;
00055 
00056 private: // disallow instantiation
00057 
00058         builder();
00059 
00060 public:
00061 
00062         static const bfs::path
00063         build(const bfs::path& input_dir, const bfs::path& output_dir,
00064                         algorithm algo = algorithm::bdz)
00065         {
00066                 if (!bfs::exists(output_dir))
00067                 {
00068                         util::throw_runtime_error("Does not exist", output_dir);
00069                 }
00070                 if (!bfs::is_empty(output_dir))
00071                 {
00072                         util::throw_runtime_error("Is not empty", output_dir);
00073                 }
00074                 util::log_info("Perform key space subdivision on input file(s)");
00075                 std::vector<bfs::path> input_files(scatter(input_dir, output_dir));
00076                 bfs::path idx_file(output_dir / index_file_name);
00077                 bfs::ofstream ofs(idx_file);
00078                 if (!ofs)
00079                 {
00080                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot create", idx_file);
00081                 }
00082                 const size_t hm_cnt(input_files.size());
00083                 util::log_info("Going to build " + util::to_string(hm_cnt) +
00084                                            " hashmap(s) on subdivided data");
00085                 for (unsigned i(0); i != input_files.size(); ++i)
00086                 {
00087                         util::log_info("Build sub-hashmap", i+1);
00088                         ofs << build_map(input_files[i], algo).filename() << '\n';
00089                         bfs::remove(input_files[i]);
00090                 }
00091                 ofs.close();
00092                 util::log_info("Construction succeeded");
00093                 util::log_info("File to reopen", idx_file);
00094                 return idx_file;
00095         }
00096 
00097 private:
00098 
00103         static const bfs::path
00104         build_hashfunc(const bfs::path& key_file, algorithm algo = algorithm::bdz)
00105         {
00106                 FILE* key_rfs(util::fopen(key_file, "r"));
00107                 cmph_io_adapter_t* source(cmph_io_nlfile_adapter(key_rfs));
00108                 cmph_config_t* config(cmph_config_new(source));
00109                 cmph_config_set_algo(config, static_cast<CMPH_ALGO>(algo));
00110                 cmph_t* mphf(cmph_new(config));
00111                 cmph_config_destroy(config);
00112                 cmph_io_nlfile_adapter_destroy(source);
00113                 util::fclose(key_rfs);
00114                 if (mphf == NULL)
00115                 {
00116                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot generate MPHF from", key_file);
00117                 }
00118                 const bfs::path mph_fn(key_file.string() + ".mph");
00119                 FILE* mph_wfs(util::fopen(mph_fn, "wb"));
00120                 cmph_dump(mphf, mph_wfs);
00121                 util::fclose(mph_wfs);
00122                 cmph_destroy(mphf);
00123                 return mph_fn;
00124         }
00125 
00126         static bfs::path
00127         build_hashtable(const bfs::path& mph_file, const bfs::path& rec_file)
00128         {
00129                 FILE* mph_rfs(util::fopen(mph_file, "rb"));
00130                 cmph_t* mph(cmph_load(mph_rfs));
00131                 if (mph == NULL)
00132                 {
00133                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot load MPHF from", mph_file);
00134                 }
00135                 bfs::ifstream ifs(rec_file);
00136                 if (!ifs)
00137                 {
00138                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot open", rec_file);
00139                 }
00140                 // allocate hash table memory
00141                 entry_type entry;
00142                 const size_t table_size(cmph_size(mph) * entry_traits::size_of(entry));
00143                 char* table(static_cast<char*>(std::malloc(table_size)));
00144                 if (table == NULL)
00145                 {
00146                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot allocate memory", table_size);
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 char* address;
00150                 std::string key;
00151                 cmph_uint32 hash;
00152                 std::string line;
00153                 std::istringstream iss;
00154                 std::string::size_type delim;
00155                 while (std::getline(ifs, line))
00156                 {
00157                         delim = line.find(key_value_delim);
00158                         if (delim == std::string::npos) continue;
00159                         key = line.substr(0, delim);
00160                         iss.str(line.substr(delim));
00161                         value::value_traits<value_type>::parse_from(entry.e2(), iss);
00162                         entry.set_e1(util::hash<checksum_type>(key));
00163                         hash = cmph_search(mph, key.c_str(), key.size());
00164                         // write checksum and value into table
00165                         address = table + hash * entry_traits::size_of(entry);
00166                         entry_traits::copy_to(entry, address);
00167                         iss.clear();
00168                 }
00169                 // write table to disk
00170                 const bfs::path dat_fn(rec_file.string() + ".dat");
00171                 FILE* dat_wfs(util::fopen(dat_fn, "wb"));
00172                 util::fwrite(table, 1, table_size, dat_wfs);
00173                 // clean up
00174                 ifs.close();
00175                 std::free(table);
00176                 cmph_destroy(mph);
00177                 util::fclose(mph_rfs);
00178                 util::fclose(dat_wfs);
00179                 return dat_fn;
00180         }
00181 
00182         static const bfs::path
00183         build_map(const bfs::path& input_file, algorithm algo = algorithm::bdz)
00184         {
00185                 const bfs::path key_file(create_keyfile(input_file));
00186                 const bfs::path mph_file(build_hashfunc(key_file, algo));
00187                 const bfs::path dat_file(build_hashtable(mph_file, input_file));
00188                 const bfs::path idx_file(input_file.string() + ".idx");
00189                 bfs::ofstream ofs(idx_file);
00190                 if (!ofs)
00191                 {
00192                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot create", idx_file);
00193                 }
00194                 ofs << mph_file.filename() << '\n'
00195                         << dat_file.filename() << std::endl;
00196                 ofs.close();
00197                 bfs::remove(key_file);
00198                 return idx_file;
00199         }
00200 
00201 
00202         static const bfs::path
00203         create_keyfile(const bfs::path& rec_file)
00204         {
00205                 bfs::ifstream ifs(rec_file);
00206                 if (!ifs)
00207                 {
00208                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot open", rec_file);
00209                 }
00210                 const bfs::path key_file(rec_file.string() + ".keys");
00211                 bfs::ofstream ofs(key_file);
00212                 if (!ofs)
00213                 {
00214                         util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot create", key_file);
00215                 }
00216                 std::string line;
00217                 std::string::size_type delim;
00218                 while (std::getline(ifs, line))
00219                 {
00220                         delim = line.find(key_value_delim);
00221                         if (delim == std::string::npos) continue;
00222                         ofs << line.substr(0, delim) << '\n';
00223                 }
00224                 ofs.close();
00225                 ifs.close();
00226                 return key_file;
00227         }
00228 
00229         static const uint64_t
00230         get_record_count(const bfs::path& input_dir)
00231         {
00232                 // std::getline is up to 10% faster than
00233                 // std::fgetc and std::iostream::get (tested)
00234                 std::string line;
00235                 bfs::ifstream ifs;
00236                 uint64_t record_count(0);
00237                 bfs::directory_iterator end;
00238                 for (bfs::directory_iterator it(input_dir); it != end; ++it)
00239                 {
00240                         if (!bfs::is_regular_file(it->path())) continue;
00241                         ifs.open(it->path());
00242                         if (!ifs)
00243                         {
00244                                 util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot open", it->path());
00245                         }
00246                         while (std::getline(ifs, line))
00247                         {
00248                                 if (!line.empty()) ++record_count;
00249                         }
00250                         ifs.close();
00251                 }
00252                 return record_count;
00253         }
00254 
00255         static const std::vector<bfs::path>
00256         scatter(const bfs::path& input_dir, const bfs::path& output_dir)
00257         {
00258                 const uint32_t recs_per_hashmap(10000000);
00259                 const uint64_t rec_count(get_record_count(input_dir));
00260                 const uint32_t rec_file_count(1 + rec_count / recs_per_hashmap);
00261 
00262                 // create record files for hash maps
00263                 char suffix[16];
00264                 std::vector<bfs::path> rec_paths;
00265                 std::vector<bfs::ofstream*> rec_files;
00266                 for (unsigned i(0); i != rec_file_count; ++i)
00267                 {
00268                         std::sprintf(suffix, ".%u", i);
00269                         rec_paths.push_back(output_dir / (input_dir.filename() + suffix));
00270                         rec_files.push_back(new bfs::ofstream(rec_paths.back()));
00271                         if (!rec_files.back()->is_open())
00272                         {
00273                                 util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot create", rec_paths.back());
00274                         }
00275                 }
00276                 // scatter records
00277                 std::string key;
00278                 std::string line;
00279                 bfs::ifstream ifs;
00280                 bfs::directory_iterator end;
00281                 std::string::size_type delim;
00282                 for (bfs::directory_iterator it(input_dir); it != end; ++it)
00283                 {
00284                         if (!bfs::is_regular_file(it->path())) continue;
00285                         ifs.open(it->path());
00286                         if (!ifs)
00287                         {
00288                                 util::throw_runtime_error("Cannot open", it->path());
00289                         }
00290                         while (std::getline(ifs, line))
00291                         {
00292                                 delim = line.find(key_value_delim);
00293                                 if (delim == std::string::npos) continue;
00294                                 key = line.substr(0, delim);
00295                                 *rec_files[util::hash32(key) % rec_file_count] << line << '\n';
00296                         }
00297                         ifs.close();
00298                 }
00299                 // clean up
00300                 for (unsigned i(0); i != rec_file_count; ++i)
00301                 {
00302                         rec_files[i]->close();
00303                         delete rec_files[i];
00304                 }
00305                 return rec_paths;
00306         }
00307 
00308 };

00311 const std::string
00312 builder<T>::index_file_name("big_hash_map.idx");
